channel.title: [Solved]How to import gateway.ova as non-gui for low RAM
channel.description: Hi, I have low ram. I searched your wiki, I can't able to find out how to import gateway.ova without having GUI enabled? Since workstation = OS that I will be using, I don't want the need for GUI in gateway. I have low RAM also. I need this method because I don't want to start gateway with 700+ MB RAM for first time Thanks!

item.title: [Solved]How to import gateway.ova as non-gui for low RAM
item.dc:creator: Grai
item.description:
Accept my apology for asking already existing article in wiki.
I suggest you change title from “Ram adjusted desktop starter” to something easy to understand like “Start gateway with no gui”.
Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: [Solved]How to import gateway.ova as non-gui for low RAM

item.title: [Solved]How to import gateway.ova as non-gui for low RAM
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Just import it as is. Then reduce RAM. With too less RAM, no GUI will be started.

It is also documented here:

Whonix – 3 May 20

Platform-specific Desktop Tips

Whonix ™ Platform-specific Desktop Tips and Tricks, RAM Adjusted Desktop Starter, Virtual Console, Full-Screen

Please ask again should you have any more questions.

Read full topic
item.source: [Solved]How to import gateway.ova as non-gui for low RAM
